Posts.EditableText: I've been using the tutorial but I can't figure out how to access any commands other than to switch rooms. I'm just playing around to learn the program better and I had a coat rack and I want to touch the coat rack. Am I supposed to make a custom command or..?
Posts.HTML: I've been using the tutorial but I can't figure out how to access any commands other than to switch rooms. I'm just playing around to learn the program better and I had a coat rack and I want to touch the coat rack. Am I supposed to make a custom command or..?

Posts.EditableText:
Sounds like you want a 'verb' here...
Select the object: coat rack, 
Select the verb tab,
Add 'touch', then add the message you want.
Posts.HTML:
Sounds like you want a 'verb' here...
Select the object: coat rack,
Select the verb tab,
Add 'touch', then add the message you want.

Posts.EditableText: That was incredibly simple. Goodness. Thank you so much.
Posts.HTML: That was incredibly simple. Goodness. Thank you so much.

Posts.EditableText: Sometimes, the simplest solution is the hardest to figure out.
